speed.name: Game Speed
speed.description: How many seconds real time must pass to advance the simulation by one tick

max_buy_orders_per_day.name: Max Buy Orders Per Day
max_buy_orders_per_day.description: How many buy orders a person can place per day

discount_rate.name: Discount Rate
discount_rate.description: How much people discount future gains. 0.75 means that a item is worth 75% of its utility in one month (30 days)

order_expiration_time.name: Order Expiration Time
order_expiration_time.description: How many days until a placed order expires

sell_history_to_consider.name: Sell History to Consider in Extreme Demand Calculation
sell_history_to_consider.description: How many days of sell history to consider when creating new business. This is used to evaluate if given business has high demand. Demand is considered 'extreme' if sum of sell orders executed in this many last days is greater than current sell orders.

max_change_per_day.name: Max Price Change Per Day
max_change_per_day.description: Maximum allowable change in price per day, as a fraction of the current price

amount_of_sell_orders_seen.name: Amount of Sell Orders Seen
amount_of_sell_orders_seen.description: How many sell orders any buyers sees, as a fraction of the total sell orders. This is to introduce some randomness in the market, so that not all buyers see the same prices.

amount_of_sell_orders_to_choose_best_pri.name: Buyer irrationanality
amount_of_sell_orders_to_choose_best_pri.description: Value of 0 means complete rationallity, value of 1.0 means complete randomness. Buyer will take this amount of orders from orders seen and choose one at random (sorted by price). This is to introduce some randomness in the market, so that not all buyers act rationally, this simulates that buyers take other factors into account, not price only

keep_resources_for_cycles_amount.name: Keep Resources For Cycles Amount
keep_resources_for_cycles_amount.description: How many cycles' worth of resources a business should aim to keep in inventory

money_to_create_business.name: Money to Create Business
money_to_create_business.description: How much money is required to create a new business. All of this money will be transferred from new owner to his new business

new_worker_salary.name: New Worker Salary
new_worker_salary.description: Starting salary for a new worker at a business

monthly_dividend.name: Monthly Dividend
monthly_dividend.description: Monthly dividend rate for a business, as a fraction of profits

min_days_between_staff_change.name: Minimum Days Between Staff Changes
min_days_between_staff_change.description: Minimum number of days a business must wait between changing staff levels. This affects both hiring and firing people. Firing will still happen if business cannot pay the workers when almost bankrupt.

goal_produced_cycles_count.name: Goal Produced Cycles Count
goal_produced_cycles_count.description: Goal number of production cycles for a business to keep in buy orders. After crossing this threshold business will reduce amount of workers hired to reduce output.

min_time_between_business_creation.name: Min Time Between Business Creation
min_time_between_business_creation.description: Minimum number of days that must pass before a new business can be created. This does not cumulate, so business spamming will not occur after a longer pause of business creation.

cit.name: CIT
cit.description:
Corporate Income Tax.

This is a tax on profits of a business. It is paid monthly, and is calculated as a fraction of profits.

pit.name: PIT
pit.description:
Personal Income Tax.

This is a tax on incomes of workers. It is paid monthly, and is calculated as a fraction of incomes such as salaries or dividends.

poor.name: Poor People
poor.description: How many poor people to start with

rich.name: Rich People
rich.description: How many rich people to start with

poor_starting_money.name: Poor People Starting Money
poor_starting_money.description: How much money poor people start with

rich_starting_money.name: Rich People Starting Money
rich_starting_money.description: How much money rich people start with

starting_money.name: Starting Money
starting_money.description: How much money the government starts with
